name: ORE
description: ORE is a couch-cooperative twin stick shooter where you and up to three friends must fight through a handful of levels and navigate the planet's varied, alien surface to collect as much ORE as possible before the planet implodes. Defeat the planetâ€™s corrupted Core Wurm, save the planet, and get rich before time runs out!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon RX 480 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: Specs recommended based on audience testing.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 3.4GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce 1070 Storage: 12 GB available space Additional Notes: Specs recommended for >60 FPS Early Access gameplay
